Okay, since I've been in NYC for a while, I thought it would be cool to share some of the food hunts (aka. restaurant explorations) I did in the past year. I am recently into journaling so I thought "why not doing both?". So, I ate and I wrote (so far two of the best things in my life). Unfortunately, the texts are in Chinese but you got the idea! <br><br>
